item.description:
**NOTE VENUE CHANGE: On 3/2 the venue was changed to Brighton Music Hall**

I am hoping some folks might be interested in joining me for the Fanfarlo show on Monday, March 5th. I love these guys! I would describe their sound as Arcade Fire meets Talking Heads.

Let's meet at 7:00PM in front of Sunset Grill (130 Brighton Ave). We can grab a table together and have a beverage before heading over to the show. I'll send an email a day or so before the show to reconfirm and provide my cell number to attendees.

Tickets are $15 in advance at the Box Office, or $20 through Ticketmaster. I believe the show sold out the last time they were in town.

I hope to meet some of you on the 5th!
item.name: Fanfarlo @ Brighton Music Hall 3/5/12
